title: Charming Coach House Apartment 2b 1b
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
2 bed, 1 bath apartment overlooking Humboldt Park's lagoon on the east side of the park at Hirsch and California.
Gutted and removed in recent years, the apartment has an upgraded bathroom with subway tile, dishwasher, granite countertops, pantry, and HVAC (heat and AC).
The coach house is set back away from California Avenue on a large lot with a southern-facing garden side lot.
Ample street parking on California Avenue and in-building laundry.
94 California Ave bus takes you to Blue or Green line transit
5 min drive to Western Metra stop (free parking) which connects to three lines (Union Station inbound or to Antioch, Elgin, or Kenosha outbound)
Call or text Sal to schedule your showing slot.
